projects.name: Growler
projects.description:
Social network similar to twitter.

Functionality:

  • browse/send growls
  • follow users
  • user feed powered by Stream 3rd party Api

projects.name: RickAndMorty API
projects.description: A simple Restful API for the Rick and Morty. The resources are Rick and Morty characters and locations. The initial data comes from the Rick and Morty API via the JSON Type Provider.
